name: Amexio Tab
description: Tab component for Angular Apps with multiple configurations such as Tab, Icon support,  Closable tabs, Amexio-color, Tab Position at top/bottom/ Tab

properties.name: closable
properties.description: This flag will make tab closable.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type can be amexio input such as (text field/ number field/ checkbox/ label/ dropdown/ toggle/ button/ image/ checkbox group/ radio group/ rating/ datefield)

properties.name: tab-position
properties.description: Position of tab can be (top/bottom) When Tab used in card and tab-position is bottom , make sure footer property of card is false.

events.name: onClick
events.description: Callback to invoke on activated tab event.
